title: Emmy Awards Seem Like A Rerun
teaser: Every actor or actress who won in a drama or comedy category at last night's Emmy Awards had won before.
contentencoded:
Predictable. That might be one way to sum up last night’s Emmy Awards show. Every actor or actress who won in a drama or comedy category has won before. NPR’s TV critic Eric Deggans talks to Here & Now’s Sacha Pfeiffer about what we might be missing from the headlines.

  • See the full list of the winners

Guest

  • Eric Deggans, TV critic for NPR. He tweets @Deggans.
